Flow.description: JRS - added Ordinance questions. Updated Project Details to Project Information
Flow.label: (Application Flow) Traffic Impact Analysis Application

screens.name: Traffic_Impact_Analysis_Submittal_Project_Details
screens.label: Traffic Impact Analysis Submittal Project Details

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name_Header} Application

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.name: Are_you_submitting_the_application_under_the_ordinances_and_policies_in_effect_a
fields.fieldText: Are you submitting the application under the ordinances and policies in effect at the time the application is accepted for review by the Town of Clayton?

fields.name: Please_specify_the_ordinance_s_and_or_policy_ies_including_version_s_under_which
fields.fieldText: Please specify the ordinance(s) and/or policy(ies), including version(s), under which the application is being submitted?

fields.name: Has_a_Scope_Meeting_been_completed
fields.fieldText: Has a Scope Meeting been completed?

fields.name: Display_Text_No_Meeting
fields.fieldText: Please contact Engineering to schedule a meeting. A meeting is mandatory to move forward in the application process.

fields.name: Complete_Scoping_Meeting
fields.fieldText: Please contact Engineering to schedule a meeting. A meeting must have taken place to move forward in the application process.

fields.name: Is_this_application_part_of_an_existing_project
fields.fieldText: Is this application part of an existing project?

fields.name: Has_NCDOT_been_contacted_about_this_project
fields.fieldText: Has NCDOT been contacted about this project?

fields.name: Display_Text_No_NCDOT
fields.fieldText: It is strongly recommended that NCDOT be contacted prior to submission. Delays could be encountered without contacting first.﻿

fields.name: Has_NCDOT_indicated_a_traffic_study_is_required
fields.fieldText: Has NCDOT indicated a traffic study is required?
